title: November GameDev Social!
description:
Come chat with fellow creators about making, playing, and admiring games! Talk about your game ideas and get inspired! Make friends and find collaborators.

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/308213046
location: Dirty 20 Bar - 14051 Manchester Rd - Ballwin, MO, us

title: Share & Play: Game Showcase/Playtesting!
description:
Join us for game playtesting! This is an opportunity for developers to share their progress, observe playtesting, and get feedback on their projects, and for local game enthusiasts to get their hands on new games, prototypes, and give helpful feedback. We will be in the Creative Lab upstairs on the second floor!

SIGNUP HERE to demo a game!

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/311042464
location: St. Louis County Library - Clark Family branch - 1640 South Lindbergh Blvd - St. Louis, MO, us

title: Game Club: Yoku's Island Express
description:
Game Club is like a book club except we pick a game to play each month and then meet up to discuss it with a focus on game design. This month's game is... Yoku's Island Express, a pinball platformer metroidvania!

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/311115814
location: Qdoba (Creve Coeur) - 766 N New Ballas Rd - Creve Coeur, MO, us

title: Game Audio Club: Music Share
description:
If you’re into making video game music or sound design (or just curious) come hang out with us once a month! Doesn’t matter if you’re a pro or just starting out— everyone’s welcome. Just bring your love for game audio. We’re a chill group where you can share your work, get feedback, or just vibe with people who love game audio. 

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/311795809
location: MAP St. Louis Montessori School - 3840 Washington Ave - St. Louis, MO, us
